First let me say thanks for the upload. It works great, except for one thing: Whenever I try to rewire Reason 4 (which I also got from here) it won't "rewire" I get a message stating: Engine not responding. Check your Rewire host." That would be Cubase. Why won't the two work together? They were meant for each other. I know the obvious answer is that it's not a legit version of Cubase nor Reason, therefore Murphy's Law is applicable. Has anyone else had this problem? Does anyone know how I can get the two to work together? PLease help. Thanks in advance. Funny thing though, Reason DOES work with my Cubase SL2 which is a legit version-go figure.

^update: I uninstalled Reason and installed a different version. in short, IT WORKS! The version I originally installed was from here and it was by "Delirium" I believe. The second one I installed was from here and just titled Reason 4 iso. So, for those who want to work with Cubase and Reason 4, this version of Cubase and the torrent titled "Reason 4 iso" is a good combo. You'll know the Reason torrent by the comments, someone posted a bunch of serials that DO WORK. I know this is not a real "forum" and is meant for comments, but I hope my comment saves someone the multiple headaches I had.

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3860679/[WinAPP-MultiLanguage]Propellerhead_Reason_4.0_  

Just copy and paste. I don't know to make this a link.

for those of you that get the "engine not responding" problem like dj blunt when trying to rewire reason into cubase try this out (make sure reason is closed first):

1) go to DEVICE SETUP in Cubase
2) click on VST AUDIOBAY
3) un-check "Release ASIO driver in background"
4) re-start

The SYNSOACC.DLL in this torrent is the TR/Crypt.XPACK.Gen trojan just to let everyone know.
Which is probably the reason why the crack did NOT work, which why after I installed, it kept saying I had protection issues (no dangle.)  Which made it so I couldn't even open Cubase.

So I went back to extract the files to set up the crack with this h2o version, and I found out the cracks are indeed trojans.

By the way, the software itself does not seem to be corrupt.  Everything installed fine and is working, I just need the crack for the dangle.

(I'm using XP Professional SP3 by the way)

So don't let my past comment sway you away from this torrent.  It's a working Cubase version, I'm just having troubles with the crack.  Which will hopefully be cleared up with the full crack torrent also on this site.
